system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: The appeal of horror fiction
generated_text:
Thrill seekers drawn to fear.
Fear releases adrenaline.
Adrenaline fuels excitement.
Excitement engages readers.

Dark themes tap into human psyche.
Exploring mortality, fear of unknown.
Fear of loss, fear of death.
Universal human experiences.

Horror fiction confronts reality.
Reality distorted, yet familiar.
Unsettling truths revealed.
Psychological insights gained.

Escape from mundane life.
Horror fiction offers temporary reprieve.
Risky, thrilling experience.
Emotional release, catharsis.

Cultural significance, historical context.
Horror fiction reflects societal fears.
Fears of past, present, future.
Reflection of human condition.

Psychological complexity, moral ambiguity.
Grey areas, no clear answers.
Thought-provoking, unsettling.
Challenging readers' perceptions.
